channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- YARPP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- YARPP

item.title: CVE-2022-4471|2024-08-03T01:41:44.920Z -- unknown -- yarpp
item.description: The YARPP WordPress plugin before 5.30.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
